summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of HI AI-APP.COM simplified landing page based on Captain's hand-drawn sketch. All 13 test features passed successfully. Fixed a minor UI bug where cosmic glow effect div was intercepting pointer events.
passed_tests: Landing page loads with cosmic animated star background (50 stars)
THE BILLION DOLLAR QUESTION section displays correctly with Brain icon badge
3 colored questions displayed: green 'Will AI make my life better?', red 'Will AI take away my job?', amber 'Or BOTH?'
ASK AGENT AIMEE TO ANALYZE YOU button navigates to /aimee-analyzer
WHO ARE YOU? section displays correctly with 'WHERE DO YOU WANT TO ENTER?' subtitle
4 Entry Point cards displayed: PUPIL, PEOPLE, PARTNERS, PERFORMERS
Entry Point cards have correct gradient colors: PUPIL (blue), PEOPLE (green), PARTNERS (purple), PERFORMERS (amber)
Entry Point cards navigate with correct role parameters: PUPIL/PEOPLE/PERFORMERS (role=doer), PARTNERS (role=employer)
12 DIVISIONS Flywheel rotates continuously with all 12 division icons visible
DOERS WORLD center hub displayed in flywheel with Globe icon
WOW - Way of Work text visible below flywheel with 'Dream → Do → Done' tagline
Language selector dropdown shows all 5 languages (English, Hindi, Kannada, Tamil, Telugu)
Astro Doer mascot appears after 2 seconds in bottom-right corner
critical_code_review_comments: Fixed: Added pointer-events-none to cosmic glow effect div in LandingPage.jsx line 267 to prevent click interception
Code quality is good - Framer-motion animations are well implemented
data-testid attributes are present on key interactive elements (ask-aimee-btn, entry-pupil, entry-people, entry-partners, entry-performers)
Multi-language i18n translations are comprehensive for all 5 languages
test_credentials: No auth required for landing page
context_for_next_testing_agent: Simplified landing page based on Captain's sketch fully tested. All features working: THE HOOK QUESTION (AI life/job question), 4 Entry Points (PUPIL/PEOPLE/PARTNERS/PERFORMERS), 12 Divisions rotating flywheel, WOW - Way of Work philosophy, Cosmic star background, Multi-lingual support (5 languages), Astro Doer mascot. Fixed pointer-events issue on cosmic glow div. Backend APIs are MOCKED as noted in the test request.
mocked_apis_note: Backend APIs (auth endpoints) are MOCKED - test focus was frontend visual testing only
